expectations.text: A CLAUDE.md (not AGENTS.md) was created for the auth package
The auth package docs mention the sliding window token rotation
The docs warn that retry logic must re-authenticate from scratch
The root CLAUDE.md was not significantly altered
expectations.evidence: Root content preserved; package-level docs pointer added

expectations.text: The subdirectory file does not duplicate content already in the root CLAUDE.md
The subdirectory file includes auth-package-specific info
expectations.evidence: Lists jose, iron-session, turbo test --filter, vitest, tsup
